resources.string: 1. Crocodile is the closest living relative to Tyranosaurus Rex.
2. Hummingbirds can have heart rate of 1260 beats per minutes.
3. Elephants have the lowest heart rate among mammals.
4. Coyote and badger are good buddies in terms of hunting.

5. The longest protein is Titin. It starts with Methionylthreonylthreonylglutaminylalanylprolylthreonylphenylalanylthreonyl- and ends with -serylalanylthreonylvalylasparaginylisoleucylhistidylisoleucylarginylserylisoleucine. On the other hand, the longest word in English it takes 3 and half hours to pronounce it.
